snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes artists scanning sculptures in the Metropolitan Museum of Art for reproduction with 3-D printers and what the chief...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes artists scanning sculptures in the Metropolitan Museum of Art for reproduction with 3-D printers and what the chief executive of Nasdaq did during the Facebook stock offering.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot:  Star Trails and Sculpture Scans
